messages.messageBody:
I have a 11yo daughter, a 10 yo son and a 7 yo daughter that would would be
tickled to have have snail mail pen pals. If any one is interested e-mail me
privately for our address.
labigduquette@...

messages.subject: Pen pals
messages.msgSnippet: Hi There: My girl is twelve and would love a snail mail pal from anywhere, of any age (not adult of course!), if there s anyone willing. We live in L.A. Van
messages.messageBody:
Hi There:
My girl is twelve and would love a snail mail pal from anywhere, of any age
(not adult of course!), if there's anyone willing. We live in L.A.
Van

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pen pals
messages.msgSnippet: Sue   My daughter almost 8 would love to have a penpal.  She has two she s been writing to but they re slow to respond.  She loves to get mail, even that
messages.messageBody:
Sue My daughter almost 8 would love to have a penpal. She has two she's
been writing to but they're slow to respond. She loves to get mail, even
that marked "occupant". Do you want to do it via an email account (hotmail)
or via post. Either way is good for Katherine.

messages.subject: Pen pals
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone...   just out of interest I thought I would mention that I have a 9 year old boy and a (almost) 7 year old girl ......I wondered if anyone has kids
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone... just out of interest I thought I would mention that I
have a 9 year old boy and a (almost) 7 year old girl ......I wondered if
anyone has kids of similar ages who would like a penpal?
Thanks......Sue
